text:
For those that did not catch our announcement, we’re performing an infrastructure update to <http://developers.HubSpot.com|developers.HubSpot.com> both the CMS and API docs may experience some temporary issues during the update, we appreciate your patience, and will have the site resuming it’s normal functionality as soon as possible.

Update: Website should be back up for you. Let us know if you run into anything strange we’ll make sure to get it resolved.
I’m getting a 404 error on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/intro-to-hubl> when I try to access it from the Reference button in Design Manager.
We can now save D&D emails as templates? When did that roll out?
Looks like the past couple of days! It was a pleasant surprise for us as well today!
this is really cool, i instantly shared this with a couple of people who have been waiting for this feature to arrive :slightly_smiling_face:
